Html:
Hello.
 
   I am using ConnectedComponentsAlgorithm to determine components of undirected graph. But it always returns me verticies of only  one component and component count is 1. I have tried  IncrementalConnectedComponentsAlgorithm and it works fine - return real number of components and their verticies.
Can this be confirmed?

Thanks , Aleksey.
